attributes.action: Close Scotland & English Borders Save Our Country From Refugees & Asylum Seekers
attributes.additional_details:
please help me show that we wont any longer stand for this crap we want to keep our country save from any more harm,
am sick & tired of all the bullcrap that cameron is coming out with that we should show our love and affection to refugees and asylum seekers look at what he has caused our country already including poor france and poor turkey all them people that was killed in both countrys,
and for once and for all keep our british troops in uk to save our own country and uk no longer feels safe
attributes.background: what does it take to save our border's and our home town, look at all the poor people who was killed in france and turkey aint that enough to prove that they just want over here to kill more people kidding on they want to seek asylum and the goverment after letting in tweedle dum and tweedle dee.
